DOC.brief_summary: Peripheral tissue ( e.g . liver , adipose , muscle ) express self-sustained circadian clock coordinate daily metabolic rhythm . The timing clock rhythms peripheral tissue highly sensitive feeding-fasting signal across sleep-wake transition . Nutritional insults high fat overfeed ( HF-OF ) show attenuate clock gene expression peripheral tissue result deleterious re-programming circadian metabolome . Studies humans superficially investigated circadian clock machinery impact nutritional signal . The overall goal pilot project take first step toward develop translational method investigate link change energy flux circadian system human tissue . Using innovative ex vivo cell culture approach investigator examine impact 3-days HF-OF compare eucaloric ( EU ) feed expression core clock gene human subcutaneous adipose tissue ( SAT ) . The Investigators hypothesize compare EU , amplitude clock gene expression SAT measure 24hrs attenuate follow short-term HF-OF . This pilot project serve launch point design future study effect diet exercise circadian control metabolism adipose tissue depot well tissue ( e.g . muscle ) .
DOC.brief_title: White Adipose Tissue Clocks High Calorie Feeding
DOC.criteria: male female age 2035 yr ; BMI 2535 kg/m2 weight stable ( ±2kg past 2mo ) ; nonsmoker ; sedentary moderately active ( ≤3 day exercise per week ≤30 min exercise per session ) ; sleep pattern > 7 hour 9.25 hrs sleep/night . subject ask identify regular consumer 3 balanced meal per day answer question : `` Do eat breakfast , lunch , dinner ≥ 5 day per week ? '' Smoker ( current within previous 3 month ) ; Use medication could affect lipid metabolism , insulin signaling , sleep ; Pregnant woman enrol study ; Have job involves shift work ; Dwelling Denver altitude ( 1,600 ) year prior test ; Travel across one time zone 3 wk study ; chronic health condition diabetes , hyper hypothyroidism , renal liver disease , anemia , cancer ; Regularly go sleep midnight ; Subjects exclude identify night eat syndrome ( least 25 % food intake consume even meal and/or least two episode nocturnal eat per week ) ; Allergy lidocaine similar compound ; Have one follow outofrange value measure fast blood sample : glucose > 110 mg/dl , thyroid stimulate hormone < 0.5 > 5.0 µU/ml . Subjects may anemic ( hemoglobin < 14.5 g/dl men , < 12.3 g/dl woman ) , abnormal liver function test ( alanine amino transferase > 47 U/l , aspartate aminotransferase , > 47 U/l , alkaline phosphatase < 39 > 117 U/l ) creatinine ( > 1.1 mg/dl ) .
